data.text:
The Sandoval County Landfill and Composting Facility is located at 2708 Iris Rd NE, Rio Rancho, NM.

Our hours of operation are Monday through Saturday, from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m.

Due to the time constraints of our normal operating hours, hand loads larger than a standard pickup truck must be in the gate before 3:30 PM or they will be turned away; this includes all trailers, no exceptions.

The Landfill is closed on Sundays and on most holidays.

The Landfill will also close if there is inclement weather or if winds exceed 25 mph.

For more information, call 505-867-0814.

Cash only, no Credit Cards, Debit Cards or Personal Checks, Business checks are OK.

For commercial companies that wish to establish an account, please fill out the Credit Application below and return it to the Landfill.

Click here for the Credit Application

Loads larger than a standard pickup truck, must be in the gate before 3:30 pm or you will need to bring it back the next working day, this includes all trailers, no exceptions, due to time restraints of our normal operating hours.

***Please note that for safety, the County may suspend landfill operations during high winds, rain or snow.
